phrases: How long do you think you can remain in Class A?
Would you think about retiring if you were demoted from Class A?
What do you think about the up-and-coming youngsters?
If my work was taken away from me, what would be left?
I am always thinking the same thing.
But I still do not have an answer.
However, if you are standing in a burnt field,
and even losing are not things that can ever be decided so easily.
I will become a human torch again today
and give full rein to my suffering.
The bishop is not going to escape?
Mr. Yanagihara is looking beyond that.
If he drops it there, I cannot...
He defended with the Bishop he just captured?
But my only defense against the 2-3 square was dropping this bishop.
He dropped the bishop right away.
I am sure if you leave Shimada alone, he will just start winning again.
It is just as you said.
He steadily built himself up and came back, one layer thicker.
It takes a long time for them to grow big,
but they are resistant to wind and rain,
and eventually become huge, tough trees.
If I had to compare myself,
I do not have a single predecessor left
who would compare me to something.
I cannot let my mind drift in the middle of a match.
And my vision is starting to blur.
But still, I feel much better than usual.
I felt terrible during our first match.
I thought I was going to die.
I am surprised I won that one.
Whoops, he is glaring at me.
There is no need to make that kind of face.
You have got the advantage right now.
I thought about it all this time.
If shogi is taken away from me, what would be left?
Kai Shimada 8th-Dan, has defended against Kishou Yanagihara's attacks with Lance to 2-5.
Now, the advantage has been reversed.
Will he finally attain his first title?
Meanwhile, Kishou Yanagihara seems more fatigued
as Shimada 8th-Dan puts pressure on him.
It looks like he is struggling and cannot concentrate.
Kishou Yanagihara is close to the Eternal Kishou, which requires ten Kishou Championship wins,
but is it beyond his reach?
Saku, is this as far as you go?
You just need one more win!
In fact, you did great making it this far!
It is frustrating, but I will look for another path.
Saku, it is over for me.
I have accepted that this is the right time.
Saku, I am moving back to the countryside.
I feel like I am in a burnt field.
I do not know why, but...
but I am not supposed to...
I will shoulder this burden and deliver it!
So for the people who tried with all their might can arrive at a place...
will not be some burnt field!
He is bringing up the King?
I have never heard of King to 1-6!
- Saku! - Saku, you can do it!
I have no move to rebuke that.
You are too old to make that move.
With time, grass will grow again on a burnt field, whether we like it or not.
It will become a field of green.
He had gone far beyond his limits.
His body leaned heavily on the armrest,
just staring at the board as if he were going to fall forward.
But each move those quivering fingers sent out
was like slowly flowing lava, heavy, red...
would desire from the bottom of their hearts...
that they have always wanted to play...
after a heated battle that covered 169 moves,
it took all of Mr. Shimada's strength to utter two words,
and brought it to an end.
After 169 moves, the winner is Kishou Yanagihara.
By the rules of the Kishou Championship, since he retained the title ten times,
he receives the official title Eternal Kishou.
Maybe someone should hold this to commemorate it.
Wow, I am right next to him!
Well, I guess I will go here.
Should the second row sit here?
I cannot fit everyone in when you are milling about.
Do not you have a wide-angle lens?
What is the difference, as long as you fit?
Hey Gan, you are getting in here too.
Would you be in the photo too?
Did not you guys come here to support me?
Yanagihara-sensei is a hero to our generation!
Yanagihara-sensei is still working hard, so we cannot be put out to pasture, either!
Maybe I will plant more plantain lilies and angelica trees in my greenhouse.
Yeah, maybe I will grow more garlic chives and green onions next year!
I cannot work away from home anymore,
but I can make some money from the greenhouse in the winter.
After all, I still want to give the grandkids some pocket money.
Get me in the photo too!
You are the one who said, Toku, I always lose when you come to watch, so stay away!
It is a good, accurate expression.
I know I am going to lose them one by one.
There were a lot of people I liked, and people I disliked.
Who I am now is made up of all those fragments.
I am bearing hundreds, even thousands of them now,
and sometimes they are so heavy that I cannot even move.
because it is bound so tightly...
it will not let me run away from my fear of becoming a human torch.
Then I guess I could also say that thanks to that weight,
I made it this far without running away.
But I will not say thanks!
Because I am serious and passionate every time!
Every single time, I think, This time for sure, I will seriously die!
They foist their dreams on me!
They sit on the sidelines and go, Hang in there!
Keep your head in the game!
Be grateful you can still play!
I am doing my best without being told, every time!
What are you going on about?
Next year would probably be impossible.
But it is too early to say that.
And of course I cannot do it.
I will die if I play a match like today's!
You are still going to push me?
That is what you told me last year.
And we are both way over 60.
We have got our 70th coming up.
This plum syrup was made by Chiho.
There is a nice smell from the plums.
You really do win when I am not there.
